name: Space Ripper Plastiline
description: It’s a hardcore space shooter. There’s no saves, a little HP and many dangerous enemies… If you can survive for 5 minutes you are arcade God!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
